quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), India’s First Floating Financial Literacy Camp was conducted in the waters of Dal Lake (Srinagar, J&K) by which of the following organizations?
options: Reserve Bank of India
India Post Payments Bank
State Bank of India
Department of Finance
SEBI

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Suryakumar Yadav has become the first Indian player to score ___________ T20I runs in a year.
options: 1500
2000
500
2500
1000

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), ‘Draft’ Common Income Tax Return Form, which has been launched by _____________ and is expected to be applicable from FY 2022-23.
options: Ministry of Corporate Affairs
Reserve Bank of India
Central Board of Indirect Taxes & Customs
Central Board of Direct Taxes
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Union Cabinet chaired by Prime Minister Modi has approved the naming of greenfield airport at Hollongi, as ‘Donyi Polo Airport’. This airport is located in which of the following states/UTs?
options: Arunachal Pradesh
Sikkim
Manipur
Assam
Meghalaya

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), which of the following state governments has decided to start medical courses in Hindi and thereby becoming the 2nd state to offer medical courses in English as well as Hindi after Madhya Pradesh?
options: Rajasthan
Uttarakhand
Uttar Pradesh
Bihar
Himachal Pradesh

quiz.text: North India’s 1st hyper-scale data centre ____________ has recently (Nov 2022) been inaugurated in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh.
options: Zeta B1
Delta Y1
Yotta D1
Peta B1
Omega D1

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), an agreement has been signed between Attero Recycling and Govt of Telangana for setting up Lithium-ion battery recycling plant at what cost?
options: ₹ 1000 Crore
₹ 200 Crore
₹ 2000 Crore
₹ 600 Crore
₹ 500 Crore

quiz.text: Which of the following tiger reserve has recently (Nov 2022) been declared as 4th tiger reserve in the state of Uttar Pradesh?
options: Ranipur TR
Dudhwa TR
Amangarh TR
Panna TR
Bandipur TR

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Jamshed J Irani, known as ‘Steel Man of India ’, has recently passed away. He was associated with which of the following companies?
options: Steel Authority of India Limited (SAIL)
Tata Steel
JSW Steel
Rashtriya Ispat Nigam Ltd. (RINL)
Jindal Stainless Ltd.

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Women’s rights activist & Padma Bhushan recipient ______________ has passed away. She was also the founder of the Self-Employed Women's Association (SEWA).
options: Aruna Sairam
Kamla Bhasin
Indra Nooyi
Ela Bhatt
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), which of the following institutes has developed a new-generation super-abrasive tools for advanced grinding applications?
options: IIT Kharagpur
IISc Bengaluru
IIT Madras
IIT Delhi
NIT Silchar

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Indian Army has collaborated with which of the following companies to setup 16 EV charging stations at Delhi Cantonment?
options: Adani Green Energy Ltd.
Suzlon Ltd.
Siemens Ltd.
Ather Grid
Tata Power

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) has launched a new chatbot with enhanced features like check Aadhaar enrollment/update status, tracking of Aadhaar PVC card status etc. Which of the following is the name of the chatbot?
options: Aadhaar Saarthi
Aadhaar Mitra
Aadhaar Chat
Aadhaar Bot
Aadhar Dost

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), an MoU for cooperation in the field of Water Resources Development and Management has been signed between India and which of the following countries?
options: France
Germany
Denmark
Australia
Netherlands

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), IndoSpace, India’s largest developer and owner of Grade A industrial real estate has signed an MoU to invest ₹3,000 crore in which of the following states to boost its warehousing and logistics sector?
options: Karnataka
Gujarat
Telangana
Maharashtra
Uttar Pradesh

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), GE Aerospace and Tata Advanced Systems Ltd have extended their manufacturing agreement, under which the latter will continue to produce and supply several commercial aircraft engine components to GE’s global engine manufacturing factories. What is the value of the contract?
options: over $500 million
over $5 billion
over $1 billion
over $2 billion
over $400 million

quiz.text: Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) and Dharmais National Cancer Hospital had signed an MoU under Cancer Patient Navigation Program to improve cancer care in which of the following countries?
options: Nepal
Sri Lanka
Bangladesh
Vietnam
Indonesia

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Civil Air Navigation Services Organisation (CANSO) Asia Pacific Conference has been organized in Goa. Which of the following is the theme of the conference?
options: Flying for all
Think Global, Collaborate Regional, Accomplish Local
Touch the Sky with Glory
Aim High … Fly-Fight-Win
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Union minister of Chemicals & fertilizers has inaugurated the India Chem 2022 on 2nd November 2022, with the theme “Vision 2030: Chemicals and Petrochemicals Build India” at which of the following places?
options: Lucknow
Mumbai
Ahmedabad
New Delhi
Bhopal

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Indian Ocean Rim Association (IORA) Seminar on Illegal Unreported and Unregulated (IUU) Fishing has been conducted by which of the following organizations/ministries?
options: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Indian Navy
World Trade Organization
Indian Coast Guards
None of the above

quiz.text: As per recent (Nov 2022) news, ISRO’s RISAT-2 satellite has made re-entry into Earth’s atmosphere. RISAT (Radar Imaging Satellite) -2 was launched in 2009 by PSLV-C12. What does ‘P’ in PSLV stands for?
options: Private
Polar
Pitch
Prime
Pole

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the nearest known black hole to Earth has been found by astronomers utilising the International Gemini Observatory, run by the NOIR Lab of the NSF. It has been named _________.
options: Cygnus X-1
IC 1459
Gaia BH1
Messier 104
HLX-1

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), 4th edition of biennial Goa Maritime Symposium (GMS-22) has been conducted by the Naval War College (NWC) at Goa. Navies and Maritime Agencies from how many countries other than India took part in the symposium?
options: 4
7
9
12
5

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), ‘Friends of Liberation War’ honour has been conferred on who among the following to commemorate the 50th anniversary of US-Bangladesh relations?
options: Edward M Kennedy
Joe Biden
Donal Trump
Kamala Harris
Nancy Pelosi

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), which of the following has become country's most profitable firm with a consolidated net income of ₹14,752 crore in the September quarter of FY23?
options: Asian Paints
Oil and Natural Gas Corporation

Reliance Industries Limited
State Bank of India

options: Suzlon Energy Ltd.

quiz.text: World Vegan Day is observed on which of the following days?
